akn:section.akn:heading: Authority of Secretary of Agriculture under other provisions of law and to establish and consult wit

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1913. Authority of Secretary of Agriculture under other provisions of law and to establish and consult with advisory committees Nothing in this Act shall be deemed to limit the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture under other provision of law or to establish or consult with advisory committees. (Pub. L. 87–128, title I, § 104, Aug. 8, 1961, 75 Stat. 295.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThis Act, referred to in text, means Pub. L. 87–128, Aug. 8, 1961, 75 Stat. 294, known as the Agricultural Act of 1961. For complete classification of this Act to the Code, see Short Title note set out under section 1911 of this title and Tables.
